name: SoulHunter
description:
IMPORTANT: Game runs better on Chrome than Firefox.

You're involved in new war operation against Aliens with help of high-tech suit capable of making you invisible, strong and fast, and you've to complete your training on the island! Hide and seek for your pray and be careful - Aliens are very hard to beat without getting them tacticaly!

Please, be an alpha version tester and share your opinion in discussion board :)
